cc_multiplefalls.question:
請問最近發生過幾次跌倒？
How many times have you fallen recently?

cc_fall.question:
這次跌倒有無撞到頭或意識喪失？
Did you hit your head or lose consciousness during the fall?

options.text: 短暫失去意識 / Brief loss of consciousness
無以上情況 / None of the above

cc_bleeding/bruising.question:
出血量是否嚴重？是否持續不止？
Is the bleeding heavy or persistent?

options.text: 出血不止 / Bleeding that won't stop
大量出血 / Large amount of bleeding
有服用抗凝血藥 / On blood thinners
有無外傷伴隨腫脹 / Bruising or swelling with injury
無以上情況 / None of the above

cc_asthma.question:
這次哮喘發作是否影響日常活動？有使用過吸入劑嗎？
Has your asthma attack affected daily activities? Have you used an inhaler?

options.text: 持續氣喘，無法說完整句子 / Persistent wheezing, unable to speak full sentences
已使用吸入劑但效果有限 / Used inhaler with limited relief
夜間氣喘加劇 / Asthma worsens at night
無以上情況 / None of the above

cc_breathingproblem.question:
請問以下哪一項描述最符合目前的呼吸情況？
Which of the following best describes your breathing?

options.text: 說話困難／喘到無法講完整句子 / Difficulty speaking or too breathless to talk
只能坐著休息，無法平躺 / Can only breathe while sitting upright
胸悶或呼吸不順 / Chest tightness or discomfort with breathing
呼吸時有聲音 / Noisy breathing or wheeze
無以上情況 / None of the above

cc_cough.question:
請問咳嗽持續多久？有無其他症狀？
How long have you been coughing? Any other symptoms?

options.text: 咳嗽持續超過一週 / Cough > 1 week
夜間加劇或影響睡眠 / Worse at night or disturbs sleep
有痰液但無發燒 / Has phlegm but no fever
無以上情況 / None of the above

cc_haemoptysis.question:
請問咳血的量與頻率？
How much and how often are you coughing up blood?

options.text: 持續咳血或量多（>一茶匙） / Ongoing or large amount (>1 teaspoon)
少量咳血但已連續兩天 / Small but persistent for 2+ days
首次出現少量咳血 / First-time minor haemoptysis
無以上情況 / None of the above

cc_wheezing.question:
是否為首次出現喘鳴聲音？有無呼吸困難？
Is this the first time you've had wheezing? Any shortness of breath?

options.text: 首次出現喘鳴且伴呼吸困難 / First-time wheeze + breathless
反覆喘鳴但無呼吸困難 / Recurrent wheeze, no breathlessness
喘鳴時有胸悶感 / Wheezing with chest tightness
無以上情況 / None of the above

cc_palpitations.question:
你有胸痛、暈眩或呼吸困難嗎？
Do you also have chest pain, dizziness, or shortness of breath?

options.text: 呼吸困難 Shortness of breath
無以上情況 / None of the above

cc_tachycardia.question:
心跳大約多少次每分鐘？
Approximately how fast is your heart rate (in BPM)?

cc_rapidheartrate.question:
你在休息時心跳仍然很快嗎？
Is your heart rate fast even while resting?

cc_irregularheartbeat.question:
是否曾經診斷為心房顫動？
Have you been diagnosed with atrial fibrillation?

cc_alteredmentalstatus.question:
是否能說出自己的名字與今天日期？
Can they state their name and today's date?

cc_confusion.question:
這情況發生多久了？是否會時好時壞？
How long has the confusion lasted? Is it fluctuating?

cc_dizziness.question:
是感覺天旋地轉還是不穩定？
Is it spinning (vertigo) or off-balance?

cc_headache.question:
是你一貫的頭痛嗎？還是不同類型？
Is this your usual headache, or a different kind?

options.text: 突發/劇烈 Sudden or worst-ever

cc_seizures.question:
是第一次發作還是有病史？
Is this your first seizure or do you have a history?

cc_nearsyncope.question:
有沒有真正暈倒？
Did you actually lose consciousness?

cc_neurologicproblem.question:
是否出現肢體無力或說話困難？
Are there symptoms like limb weakness or slurred speech?

cc_headache-newonsetornewsymptoms.question:
是突發或劇烈的頭痛嗎？
Is it sudden or the worst headache you've ever had?

cc_abdominalpain.question:
腹痛持續多久？是否局部或擴散？
How long has the abdominal pain lasted? Is it localized or spreading?

options.text: 持續超過6小時 Pain > 6 hrs

cc_vomiting.question:
嘔吐次數與內容？有無脫水跡象？
How many times have you vomited, and is there dehydration?

options.text: 持續多次嘔吐 Multiple episodes
口乾少尿 Dry mouth / low urine

cc_gibleeding.question:
腸胃出血的表現方式為何？
What form is the GI bleeding?

options.text: 出血持續未止 Ongoing bleeding

cc_dehydration.question:
是否有明顯脫水跡象？
Are there clear signs of dehydration?

options.text: 極少排尿 Very low urine output

cc_swallowedforeignbody.question:
吞入異物後是否感到不適？
Do you feel discomfort after swallowing the object?

options.text: 胸口或喉嚨不適 Chest/throat discomfort
呼吸困難 Shortness of breath
